item.title: Owncast v0.1.0 Retrospective - Frontend Web Rewrite
item.description: This post is a continuation of posts leading up to Owncast v0.1.0 that discusses some of the high level goals for the release. Read the first post about a Owncast redesign for part 1. Hack the planet! One of the high level goals for Owncast since day one was hackibility. I wanted what was shipped to be a starting point for people looking to run their own custom live streams, not a locked in experience.
